name: Miridalia Monarchy
description:
The Theme for this Weekly Game Jam was Monarchy, the game relates to the theme because it:

  1. Takes place in an old castle which belongs to the old Monarchy of Miridalia.
  2. The player interacts with the spirits of the deceased Monarchs.
  3. The title is in the name of the game.

Note: Currently the game is incomplete, the ending hasn't been made yet, but you can *walk* around. This is a text-adventure/game book, and this is my first time using the engine. Also the game works best in Microsoft Edge, sorry for the inconvenience.

Special Thanks to Consistency (Discord) for helping me set up this html file to work!
